# 6.0 Docs

> Documentation for 6.0 Docs.

*Topics available: 2*

- [Breaking change: DuplexChannelFactory captures synchronization context](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/wcf-client/6.0/duplex-synchronization-context.md): Learn about the breaking change in WCF Client 6.0 where the DuplexChannelFactory now captures the synchronization context when it's opened.
- [Breaking change: WCF Client support for .NET Standard](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/compatibility/wcf-client/6.0/net-standard-2-support.md): Learn about the breaking change in WCF Client 6.0 where it no longer supports .NET Standard 2.0.
